item.title: My Résumé
item.description:
Contact

Aaron Di Silvestro

aaron <at> bkrn <dot> org

Recent Open-source Projects

Pynfrence

github.com/bkrn/pynfrence

Description

  • Python based analytical modelling project based around generic probablity distributions, simple machine learning, and rapid visualization.

Key Skills

  • Generically modeled objective distributions of categorical, ordinal, and continuous samples
  • Develop and apply seld implemented bayseian and k-means algorithims
  • Integrated visualized results using pyplot/matplotlib

Buzzer Beater

github.com/bkrn/buzzer-beater

Description

  • Go and JS based IOT doorbell based around RaspberryPi

Key Skills

  • Integrate home server and AWS lambda
  • Tooling about with a bread board
  • Android targeted mobile development

Recent Experience

Data Engineer

  • Nike — Nov 2016 - Current
  • Description
    • Full stack data engineer under contract with Nike Sustainable Business and Innovation on the Advanced Analytics Team.
  • Accomplishments
    • Designed and implemented (diagram to code) central ETL, modeling, and reporting stack
    • Implemented and maintained team environemnt in broader Nike data warehouse
    • Coded POC D3.js based visualization tool and oversaw production implementation of code by contractor
  • Skills
    • Production Go and Python in web and analytics applications
    • Internal application development
    • Enterprise ETL architecture
    • Oracle and Mongo database administration
    • D3.js, tableau, and Python data visualization

Data and Reporting Analyst

  • Cambia Health Solutions — June 2016 - Sept 2016
  • Description
    • Quarter long contract with Operation Analytics Center of Excellence focused on reporting and telphony migrations

Skills

Education

item.title: avalanche forecast
item.description:
What?

Avalanche forecast will, with realistic terrain, weather, and snowpack modeling, provide an avalanche forecasting experience. The final game will balance education and entertainment in a way that targets enthusiastic backcountry recreators.

Status

Current work is focused on procedural terrain generation and display. The terrain generation engine must consistently produce known avalanche terrain on arbitrary aspects. Display is targetting a terminal UI for fun and speed.
